bibl.title: Photograph of an overview of Quemados, Cuba with the Camp Lazear site designated by [Philip Showalter Hench,] [n.d.]

div1.head: Photograph of an overview of Quemados, Cuba with the Camp Lazear site designated by [Philip Showalter Hench,] [n.d.]
div1.p:
This is Camp Lazear
as it now remains
Beneath this tree is the remains of
Walter Reed's Bldg #1
Please 1 make photographic copy of the above
if possible full size. (I need 6 prints)
2 make slide of the above.
You can
remove this
paper if you wish
but I want only the
above part & as large as possible
Please be sure to include the upper right corner which just
shows the seacoast; this is important
Sorry I don't have the film; this photo was specially taken for me by
the Cuban Army Air Force but they only sent one picture; not the film.
DR. PHILIP S. HENCH
MAYO CLINIC
ROCHESTER, MINN.
